OrgName: Clinical Trial Media, Inc. DBA CliniCallRN
activities: Clinical Trial Media, Inc. dba CliniCallRN provides call center services to the clinical research industry. Specifically, CliniCallRN takes calls from people responding to advertisements regarding participation in clinical research studies. CliniCallRN's European-based call center agents use IRB/IEC approved scripts for informing and pre-screening callers. If the caller provides their verbal authorization, their data is sent directly to a European-based clinical research clinic for further evaluation. These IRB/IEC approved scripts also provide the caller with an option to have their information deleted from the database. The data passes through, or is stored as authorized in a secure US based server. Data from European callers is never used or disclosed to any third party in the US for any reason.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: CliniCallRN uses the services of Better Business Bureau as the dispute resolution provider
